t1_features.title: Responsive
t1_features.text: Your landing page displays smoothly on any device: desktop, tablet or mobile.

t1_features.title: Customizable
t1_features.text: You can easily read, edit, and write your own code, or change everything.

t1_features.text: There is a bunch of useful and necessary elements for developing your website.

t1_features.title: Clean Code
t1_features.text: You can find our code well organized, commented and readable.

t1_features.title: Documented
t1_features.text: As you can see in the source code, we provided a comprehensive documentation.

t1_features.title: Free Updates
t1_features.text: When you purchase this template, you'll freely receive future updates.

settings.t8_lead_text: Use the Gmail you love – for business. Get custom email @yourcompany.com including calendar, docs, video meetings, and more with access from your phone or tablet.
settings.t9_lead_text: If you have visited the other pages and you have made your decision to purchase this template, go on and press the following button and get a license in less than a minute.

settings.t1_lead_text: Got a question? We've got answers. If you have some other questions, see our support center.

t1_faqs.question: What payment services do you support?
Can I cancel my subscription?
t1_faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.

t1_faqs.question: Is this a secure site for purchases?
t1_faqs.answer: Absolutely! We work with Stripe which guarantees your safety and security. All site communication and data transfer are secured and encrypted.

t1_faqs.question: Can I update my card details?
t1_faqs.answer: Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.

t1_faqs.question: Can I try Helpato for free?
t1_faqs.answer: Of course! We’re happy to offer a free plan to anyone who wants to try our support system. There is no credit card required; you get access to all our great features; and if you choose to upgrade to a paid plan, you can keep all of your data too!

t1_faqs.question: What if I want to change plans?
t1_faqs.answer: It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard. Changes to your account will happen in real-time and any fees will be changed accordingly.

t1_faqs.question: How long are your contracts?
t1_faqs.answer: Currently, we only offer monthly subscription. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation. Yearly subscription with generous discount will become available soon.

t1_faqs.question: Why do you ask for several permissions in login?
t1_faqs.answer: Envato API requires us to ask for these permissions to have the ability to get your details, items, purchased items, etc. on your behalf. We take privacy extremely seriously, and will never send messages, or access your data for anything other than our stated purposes.

t1_faqs.question: Are you affiliated with Envato?
t1_faqs.answer: No, we are not affliated or supported by Envato.

t1_faqs.question: Can I get refund?
t1_faqs.answer: Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.

settings.t2_lead_text: Send an email if you couldn't find an answer to your question here.

t2_faqs.question: What is TheSaaS?
t2_faqs.answer: It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

t2_faqs.question: How long are your contracts?
t2_faqs.answer: You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation.
